articles.author: Kate Bartlett
articles.title: Trump Administration say South Africa's Ambassador to U.S. 'persona non grata' - NPR
articles.description: Secretary of State Marco Rubio says he's kicking out the Ambassador from South Africa -accusing him of hating America and hating Donald Trump.
articles.content:
Secretary of State Marco Rubio says he's kicking out the new Ambassador from South Africa accusing him of hating America and hating Donald Trump.
It's the latest salvo against South Africa, which ha… [+3430 chars]
